# 
::: {#edu-exp}
:::
I'm an aspiring international economist with a passion for unraveling the complexities of our interconnected world. My research interests lie at the intersection of globalization, trade dynamics, migration patterns, and development economics. What truly sets my work apart is my special fascination with spatial data management, a powerful tool that allows us to visualize and understand how economic forces shape the geographical landscape. Join me on this exciting journey as we explore the intricacies of global economics and its impact on our ever-evolving world.
